title: Rich Double Dark Chocolate Truffles
directions: Place dates and coconut oil into your food processor and pulse until completely finely chopped.
Add in stevia here (if you are using it), vanilla and cocoa powder.
Blend until completely mixed and smooth.
Line a large plate or baking sheet with parchment paper.
Using your hands OR a melon baller form dough into 1-inch balls and place on parchment covered plate or baking sheet.
Place in the freezer for 1-2 hours.
Place balls on a grated cooling rack with parchment or a dish below to catch drippings.
Remove balls from freezer, place on rack and using a spoon quickly drizzle chocolate evenly over the top and sides.
Enjoy immediately or place back in the refrigerator or freezer to enjoy at a later date.
ingredients: 20 Pitted Super Soft Fresh Medjool Dates
10 Drops of Liquid Stevia (optional - not needed)
Prepare our Chocolate Coating Recipe (found here) - (or use melted vegan dark chocolate chips). Prepare recipe but do not freeze into chocolates. Leave at room temperature.
